entry.title: Bitcoin dev list bounce
entry.summary: The message is a signed email from Venzen Khaosan to Warren, asking for confirmation if there was a reason why his public apology message to Sergio Lerner bounced back from the list. He also sent the message to Sergio's personal email account but believes that a public apology would be more appropriate to set the record straight and in the interest of goodwill. The email is signed with a PGP signature.
